00036 class KVIRC_API KviTreeWindowListItem : public QTreeWidgetItem , public KviWindowListItem
00037 {
00038         friend class KviTreeWindowList;
00039         friend class KviTreeWindowListTreeWidget;
00040         friend class KviTreeWindowListItemInternal;
00041 public:
00042         KviTreeWindowListItem(QTreeWidget * par,KviWindow * wnd);
00043         KviTreeWindowListItem(KviTreeWindowListItem * par,KviWindow * wnd);
00044         ~KviTreeWindowListItem();
00045 public:
00046         virtual QString key() const;
00047         virtual void captionChanged();
00048         virtual void highlight(int iLevel = 1);
00049         virtual void unhighlight();
00050         virtual void setProgress(int progress);
00051         virtual void applyOptions();
00052 protected:
00053         void setActive(bool bActive);
00054         bool operator<(const QTreeWidgetItem &other)const
00055         {
00056                 return key() < ((KviTreeWindowListItem*)&other)->key();
00057         }
00058 };
